name: Grid Pix
overview: Welcome to Grid Pix! An exciting new world of logical puzzle solving awaits you. Featuring 100 chunky Picross style pixel-art puzzles (and the option to load in more via future DLC packs), beautiful high-resolution graphics, multiple music tracks to play whilst you think (silence is also optional), PAL/NTSC compatibility and on-cartridge saving! There are no annoying time limits or anything to distract you from the challenge ahead, just 100 hand-pixelled nonograms with only a single solution!
